text: 3. How do we store personal information

text: 5. How do we protect personal information security

(1) We attach great importance to the security of your personal information, and we will strive to take reasonable security measures (including technical and management) to protect your personal information and prevent your personal information from being improperly used or unauthorizedIt was interviewed, publicly disclosed, used, modified, damaged, lost or leaked.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We attach great importance to the security of your personal information, and we will strive to take reasonable security measures (including technology and management) to protect your personal information.

text: (2) We will use reasonable and feasible methods such as encryption technology and anonymous treatment that are not lower than industry peers to protect your personal information, and use a security protection mechanism to prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will use reasonable and feasible methods such as encryption technology and anonymous treatment that are not lower than industry peers to protect your personal information, and use a security protection mechanism to prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.

text: (3) We will establish a special security department, security management system, and data security process to ensure your personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will establish a special security department, security management system, and data security process to ensure your personal information security.

text: We adopt strict data use and access systems to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your personal information and conduct security audits of data and technology in a timely manner.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We adopt strict data use and access systems to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your personal information and conduct security audits of data and technology in a timely manner.

text: (4) Although the above -mentioned reasonable and effective measures have been taken and the standards required by relevant legal regulations have been adopted, please understand that due to the technical restrictions and various malicious means that possible existingSafety measures cannot always ensure 100 % security of information. We will try our best to ensure the security of our personal information.
You know and understand that the systems and communication networks you use to access our services may be due to factors outside the control scope.

Therefore, we strongly recommend that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to the use of complex passwords, regularly modify passwords, do not disclose personal information such as your account number and password, SMS verification code to others.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We strongly recommend that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to the use of complex passwords, regularly modify passwords, do not disclose personal information such as your account number and password, SMS verification code to others.

text: (5) We will develop an emergency treatment plan and immediately start the emergency plan when the user information security incident occurs, and strives to prevent the impact and consequences of such security incidents from expanding.

Data Security
rewrite: We will develop an emergency treatment plan and immediately start the emergency plan when the user information security incident occurs, and strives to prevent the impact and consequences of such security incidents.

text: Once the user information security incident (leakage, loss, etc.) occurs, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of security events, the disposal measures we have adopted or we will take, you can autonomous autonomous autonomySuggestions for preventing and reducing risks, remedial measures for your remedy.

Data Security
rewrite: Once the user information security incident (leakage, loss, etc.) occur, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: basic situations and possible impacts, disposal measures, suggestions, remedial measures, etc.

text: We will promptly inform you in the form of push notifications, emails, letters, text messages, etc. When it is difficult to inform them one by one, we will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.

Data Security
rewrite: We will promptly inform you in the form of push notifications, emails, letters, text messages, etc. When it is difficult to inform them one by one, we will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.

Data Security
rewrite: We will also report to the disposal of user information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the relevant regulatory authorities.

text: 8. Amendment and notice of privacy policy

(2) After the "Privacy Policy" is updated, we will issue a updated version in "Understanding Emperor", and remind you of the updated content through the official website announcement or other appropriate ways before the update.The latest version of this "Privacy Policy".
